verses.name: Psalms 60:1
verses.text: O God, thou hast cast us off, thou hast scattered us, thou hast been displeased; O turn thyself to us again.

verses.name: Psalms 60:2
verses.text: Thou hast made the earth to tremble; thou hast broken it: heal the breaches thereof; for it shaketh.

verses.name: Psalms 60:3
verses.text: Thou hast shewed thy people hard things: thou hast made us to drink the wine of astonishment.

verses.name: Psalms 60:4
verses.text: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 60:5
verses.text: That thy beloved may be delivered; save with thy right hand, and hear me.

verses.name: Psalms 60:6
verses.text: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.

verses.name: Psalms 60:7
verses.text: Gilead is mine, and Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;

verses.name: Psalms 60:8
verses.text: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe: Philistia, triumph thou because of me.

verses.name: Psalms 60:9
verses.text: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?

verses.name: Psalms 60:10
verses.text: Wilt not thou, O God, which hadst cast us off? and thou, O God, which didst not go out with our armies?

verses.name: Psalms 60:11
verses.text: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.

verses.name: Psalms 60:12
verses.text: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.
